attributes.bio: Nina finds stories where others see chaos. She weaves narratives about community-building, whether it’s through a neighborhood block party or the ensemble dynamics of a prestige TV series. She's a fan of slow-burn dramas and quick-witted comedies. Why she’s cool: Nina’s the friend who can turn any dinner table chat into a fascinating dialogue about character arcs—and recommend the perfect show for your mood.
attributes.fullBio: A narrative alchemist at heart, Nina Kapoor discovers stories in the most unexpected places. Her vision for community-building and human connections translates into evocative, heartwarming tales. With a penchant for subtle storytelling, she unravels character arcs masterfully.
attributes.quote: Nina’s the friend who can turn any dinner table chat into a fascinating dialogue about character arcs—and recommend the perfect show for your mood.

featuredImage.altText: Nina Kapoor at a community event
